about_the_game:
Uncover new constellations and re-light the stars by connecting colorful Starshapes. Create unique and beautiful solutions to abstract three-dimensional puzzles and experience the calm of outer space.

Solve puzzle constellations

Go stargazing and re-imagine the night sky by drawing your own constellations in 3D puzzles with multiple solutions. Experience constellations from new angles in three dimensions as you etch them into space.

Pick your own path through puzzles and unlock new and interesting rules as you progress. Unwind with ‘Connect the dots’ style secret levels featuring real-life constellations and star signs. Soak in the beautiful starlight of all the puzzles you’ve completed along your journey.

Create new constellations


  • Draw, Erase and Edit connections between stars to solve the puzzle and create a constellation.
  • Drag and rotate puzzles in 3D to view them from different angles.
  • Smooth and elegant animations communicate gameplay to you in an abstract way.

Stargaze your own way

  • Tailor your experience with accessibility features, such as color-blindness options.
  • Undo, Redo and Reset with convenient shortcuts.

Observe abstract space

  • Zoom out and view the constellations you have made so far and track your progress.
  • Play puzzles of varying difficulty, ranging from simple connect the dots puzzles to more challenging ones.
  • Starshapes features over 50 hand-made puzzles and more than a dozen hidden secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 Fury / NVIDIA GTX 970 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 7600 / NVIDIA RTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
